title: Introduction
text:
These case studies are examples used by the University of Southampton Open Research & Publication Practice team to accompany our “Open access for diverse research outputs​” session.
The case studies are fictional, and are based on scenarios generated by Microsoft Copilot.
Please contact us at eprints@soton.ac.uk if you have any questions or comments.
